review: Excellent Doctor who was straight to the point.  An expert in identifying the issue.  Explains the issue very well with outstanding treatment.  Avoids unnecessary treatment/suggestions which most of them in the industry doesn't follow these days.  I am fully recovered now from my elbow dislocation; thank you Doctor.

review: First of all i like his friendliness and his explanations   on the cause of illness. As of now, i m under going treatment and recovering slowing. Hoping for the best. He explains the things properly on what to do and what not to do so that the recovery is fast. I would recommend him if you have any similar problems or illness. Kudos to Dr Praveen.

review: Doctor Praveen was absolutely fantastic, he picked up the issue quickly and avoided unnecessary treatment and scans for my 6 year old daughter. Also advised about future check up has we are flying aboard. I would recommend doctor Praveen to all my friends and family. Thank you all staff members at sagar for taking good care of my child.
